column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We came hear after hearing all of the recommendations from locals & our friends! We were very excited to try the deep dish pizza. There was not a wait when we arrived. We were seated immediately. My husband
column5: & 2 pizzas. The food took pretty long to come out. We definitely over estimated our appetites and didn't finish the food
column6: but were so excited to try everything! Unfortunately
column7: the pizza was heavy and a little on the soggier side. The cheese didn't seem fully melted & there was not much flavor. We may give this place another try when we come!
